introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to Nuxt SaaS Starter template documentation.
introduction.content: Nuxt SaaS Starter is a **open source boilerplate** and will help you to create your own SaaS website with Nuxt.js. It is built with Nuxt 3, Nuxt UI and Nuxt Content. It is a perfect starting point for your next project.
introduction.resource: This documentation is your go-to resource for configuring and using the starter effectively.
introduction.start: Let's get started and happy coding!

features.title: Features
items: Public website with pricing and marketing pages
Write content with MDC syntax thanks to Nuxt Content

github.title: Github Repository
github.description: Feel free to contribute to the project on GitHub.

installation.description: How to install Nuxt SaaS Starter.

quickStart.title: Quick Start - New project
quickStart.description: You can start a fresh new project by cloning the repository from GitHub. Run the following command in your terminal:
quickStart.createEnv: Create a `.env` file in the root directory or copy/paste the `.env.example` file

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Let's check the configuration part for update all environment variables before use `pnpm run dev`
